Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIc bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Clostridium clostridiforme ATCC25537, C. perfringens, Eubacterium ruminentium ATCC17233, Lachnospira multiperus ATCC19207, L. vitulinus ATCC27783, Lactobacillus ruminis ATCC27780, Ruminococcus albus SY3, Streptococcus bovis ATCC33317, Listeria ivanovii 80, L. gray 83.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of a bacteriocin (Butyrivibriocin AR10) from the ruminal anaerobe Butyrivibrio fibrisolvens AR10 evidence in support of the widespread occurrence of bacteriocin-like activity among ruminal isolates of B. fibrisolvens.
Literature.Author: Kalmokoff ML, Teather RM.

Literature.Title: Butyrivibriocin AR10, a new cyclic bacteriocin produced by the ruminal anaerobe Butyrivibrio fibrisolvens AR10 characterization of the gene and peptide.
Literature.Author: Kalmokoff ML, Cyr TD, Hefford MA, Whitford MF, Teather RM.
